subtitle: A quick preserve to make. Look for kiwi fruit on special offer.

method.text: Slice the fruit into 1 cm/ <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub>in slices. Place in a bowl, layering with sugar. Cover and leave for 24hr.
Put the fruit into a heavy-based pan and place over a gentle heat until the sugar dissolves. Then bring to the boil for 5 min.
Leave to cool for 10-15 min before potting into clean sterlised jars. Label and store in a cool dark place.

title: Kiwi conserve
